text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY, NEW YORK 12224
DIVISION OF EDUCATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
LEE E. CAMPION, DIRECTOR
GR 4-5974
December 23, 1964
Miss Marion Corwell
Associate Director
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Miss Corwell:
I regret that I am so late in replying to your letter
of October 9. I have been attempting, since receipt of
your letter, to get at this task of developing a speakers'
guide.
I intend to get at the problem first thing next year.
Please be patient with me.
Sincerely yours
Lee 4
Director
LECrrt
